column2: You can choose a personal patron deity from among the many powerful gods and godesses of the Tabitian pantheon.
I should dedicate myself to a particular deity and let their power inform my rule.
column3: Je devrais m'en remettre à une divinité particulière et laisser sa puissance guider mon régne.

column2: Xucau, the chief of the Gods
Uastyrdzhi, the God of males, travellers and oaths
Wasilla, the God of rain, thunder and lightning
These are all powerful deities. Choosing one of them as my patron deity would be a testament to the power of my dynasty.
column3: Toutes ces divinités sont puissantes. Choisir l'une d'elles comme divinité protectrice serait un témoignage de la puissance de ma dynastie.

column2: Safa, the God of the hearth chain
Donbettyr, the God of the waters
